name: librephotos
description: LibrePhotos is a self-hosted photo management platform, similar to Google Photos. It automatically organizes photos using AI, supports face recognition, timelines, tagging, and maps, while protecting user privacy.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Automatic photo tagging, Face recognition, Object detection. Organize photos intelligently

features.title: Timeline & Maps
features.description: Photo timelines, Location mapping, Travel visualization. Browse photos by time and place

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted, No cloud tracking, Full data control. Google Photos alternative you own

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Full-text search, Advanced filters, Smart albums. Find any photo instantly
